-
Huge ‘golf ball-sized’ hailstones pelt Tennessee as strong storms kill at least two peopleLarge hail pelted parts of Tennessee on Wednesday 8 May, as strong storms slammed the state killing at least 2 people.
-
Trump trial live: Trump’s mistrial and gag order motions denied after dramatic Stormy Daniels testimonyAdult film actress concludes testimony after firmly refuting alleged inconsistencies in her account of the sexual encounter she claims she had with the former president in a Lake Tahoe hotel room in July 2006
-
Watch live view of camp for displaced Palestinians in Rafah as Israeli strikes intensifyWatch a live view from a camp for displaced people in Rafah on Friday 10 May.
-
Netanyahu defies ally Joe Biden and says Israel will ‘fight with fingernails’ if US stops arms suppliesIsraeli prime minister vows again to go ahead with ground offensive in Rafah, where over 1.3 million Palestinians are sheltering
-
Pro-Palestinian protesters demand endowment transparency. But its proving not to be simpleSome universities are vowing to provide information about how much university endowment money is invested in companies profiting from the Israel-Hamas war amid calls from pro-Palestinian protesters
-
Fight to save African penguin goes to lawEvery year there are fewer African penguins and soon there may be none at all, scientists warn.
-
Trump turns to oil industry for $1bn towards campaign as they draft executive orders for him to signThe call for donations comes after Mr Trump struggled to make a bond payment in New York earlier this year
-
Four flight attendants arrested for smuggling $8m in drug money from NYC to CaribbeanThe defendants smuggled large amounts of illicit money linked to the sale of narcotics, including fentanyl, from the US and took advantage of airport security checkpoints by using their ‘trusted positions as flight attendants’
-
Conservative plan calls for Trump to kill everyone on federal death row in second termTrump oversaw historic execution spree in office during first term
-
Trump's lawyers spar with Stormy Daniels in trialThe BBC's Nada Tawfik goes through the cross-examination that the former adult-film star faced in court.
-
Stormy Daniels’ tweets, Make America Horny Again, a failed mistrial bid: Takeaways from Trump trial day 14Adult film start at centre of case stays calm and determined in face of combative questioning as her testimony concludes
-
Dozens of women denounce alleged serial stalker Rebeca García, say authorities ignored it because ‘she’s a woman’Venezuelan authoritieshave dismissed the case under the pretexts that ‘harassment between women doesn’t exist’ but federal prosecutors have now opened an investigation
-
Apple apologises after piano crushing ad backlashThe technology giant apologised after Hugh Grant and others criticised the "tone deaf" iPad advert.
-
Blooms, balls and blunts: Africa's top shotsA selection of the week's best photos from across the continent and beyond.
-
Ex-White House ‘gatekeeper’ cries on stand as she testifies about Trump firing herMadeleine Westerhout was questioned at hush money trial about setting up meeting with Trump and Michael Cohen
-
Netanyahu defiant after US threat to stop weaponsIsraeli leader says his country will "stand alone" and "fight with fingernails" if shipments are halted.
-
Why are beauty queens relinquishing their crowns? All the allegations against Miss Universe leadershipPageant queens Noelia Voigt and UmaSofia Srivastava both announced they were stepping down from their respective positions this week putting the Miss Universe Organization in the spotlight, writes Mike Bedigan
-
Police release bodycam footage in Air Force airman shooting after family claims cops failed to announce presenceThe Okaloosa County Sheriff’s Office has denied family allegation that deputy involved in shootingwent to the wrong apartment
-
Taylor Swift changes Eras tour setlist for EuropeThe star kicks off the latest leg of her tour in Paris, adding new songs and cutting some favourites.
-
Two skiers killed and one rescued after Utah avalancheTwo men aged 23 and 32 killed, while one skier managed to dig out and was taken to hospital by rescuers
-
Israel heads to Eurovision final, despite protestsTwenty-year-old singer Eden Golan makes the final, despite being booed during dress rehearsals.
-
US airman shot and killed by police in FloridaRoger Fortson - who was armed - was fatally shot by officers responding to a disturbance call at his home.
-
Her husband pretended to be a stalker ex-boyfriend. Now he’s charged with her murderDaniel Krug appeared on Thursday in a Colorado court accused of murdering his wife Kristil — but in a bizarre twist, authorities say Krug pretended to stalk his wife in order to frame her ex-boyfriend
-
Where Stormy Daniels' testimony leaves the Trump trialExperts say the star witness's answers were sometimes useful - and other times completely irrelevant.
-
Watch: Donald Trump’s hush money trial continues as Stormy Daniels returns to witness standWarning: This livestream has not been independently fact-checked and may contain misinformation.
-
Watch: Putin’s Victory Day concludes with fireworks in Moscow amid Ukraine warWatch as Russia’s annual Victory Day concluded with fireworks in Moscow on Thursday, 9 May.
-
Three men stranded near Big C Rock in New York City rescued by policeThree men who had become stranded near the Big C Rock in New York Citywere rescued by NYPD officers on Wednesday, 8 May.
-
Trump’s defense secretary called him ‘a madman in a circular room screaming’, new book revealsJim Mattis resigned as Mr Trump’s first defense secretary after the president withdrew troops from Syria in 2018
-
Florida man arrested for pulling AR-15 rifle on Uber driver dropping off daughterThe father defended his reaction, saying ‘everybody knows what’s going on in this country with fentanyl and child trafficking and rape’
-
Mom of ‘treadmill killer dad’ claims he ‘cried hysterically’ after six-year-old son diedCarolyn Gregor broke down on the stand at his murder trial as she testified about the day her grandson Corey Micciolo died from alleged abuse
